text:
@BetsyDeVosED @TuckerCarlson @TuckerCarlson,

Critical topic. Most students learned NOTHING during #COVID19 #schoolclosures. When the Children become union & political pawns, everyone loses. If Congress won’t work TOGETHER to responsibly reopen schools then federal funding should be withheld! @moms4FAPE
